title: Deck Dominance
description: Deck Dominance is a high-stakes, strategic showdown where teams face diverse challenges tied to card suits. Teams must complete tasks, collect cards, and score maximum points. Only the sharpest and most collaborative teams will claim victory.
registration: Only college students are permitted to participate.
A valid college ID is mandatory.
The team-head should register for the event, on behalf of the team.
Participants must wear the registration throughout the day.
Prior registration is mandatory to attend any event/workshops, either online or on-spot.
Re-entry is not allowed, and the fee paid for any event/workshops is non-refundable.
rules: Each member randomly draws a card from the deck.
Each shape of card will follow a particular style of challenges and each card will have a point.
If the challenge is successfully completed, the player earns the card and the points. Otherwise, they lose their turn, along with the card and points.
The team that collects the most cards with the most points will advance towards victory.
Usage of mobile phones or any external help is not allowed.
Any team that violates the rules or engages in unsportsmanlike conduct may be disqualified.
